name: outcome/3pt_MACE
description: Condition record of acute myocardial infarction, hemorrhagic or ischemic stroke or sudden cardiac death during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/4pt_MACE
description: 3-Point MACE $+$ inpatient or ER visit (hospitalization) with heart failure condition record

name: outcome/Acute_myocardial_infarction
description: Condition record of acute myocardial infarction during an inpatient or ER vist

name: outcome/Stroke
description: Condition record of hemorrhagic or ischemic stroke during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/Hospitalization_with_heart_failure
description: Inpatient or ER visit with heart failure condition record

name: outcome/Sudden_cardiac_death
description: Condition record of sudden cardiac death during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/Transient_ischemic_attack
description: Transient ischemic attack condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hemorrhagic_stroke
description: Intracranial, cerebral or subarachnoid hemorrhage condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Ischemic_stroke
description: Ischemic stroke condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Revascularization
description: Procedure record of percutaneous coronary intervention or coronary artery bypass grafting during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/All-cause_mortality
description: Death record of any type

name: outcome/Abdominal_pain
description: Abdominal pain condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Abnormal_weight_gain
description: Abnormal weight gain record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes; note, weight measurements not used

name: outcome/Abnormal_weight_loss
description: Abnormal weight loss record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes; note, weight measurements not used

name: outcome/Acute_pancreatitis
description: Condition record of acute pancreatitis during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/Acute_renal_failure
description: Condition record of acute renal failure during an inpatient or ER visit

name: outcome/Anaphylactoid_reaction
description: Anaphylactoid reaction condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with >7 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Anemia
description: The first condition record of anemia

name: outcome/Angioedema
description: Angioedema condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with >7 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Angle_closure_glaucoma
description: The first condition record of angle-closure glaucoma

name: outcome/Anxiety
description: The  first condition record of anxiety, which is followed by another anxiety condition record or a drug used to treat anxiety

name: outcome/Bone_fracture
description: Bone fracture condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Bradycardia
description: The first condition record of bradycardia, which is followed by another bradycardia condition record

name: outcome/Breast_cancer
description: Primary malignant neoplasm of breast condition record of any type; limited to female and earliest event per person

name: outcome/Cardiac_arrhythmia
description: The first condition record of cardiac arrhythmia, which is followed by another cardiac arrhythmia condition record, at least two drug records for a drug used to treat arrhythmias, or a procedure to treat arrhythmias

name: outcome/Chest_pain_angina
description: The first condition record of chest pain or angina

name: outcome/Chronic_kidney_disease
description: The first condition record of chronic kidney disease, which is followed by either another chronic kidney disease condition record or a dialysis procedure or observation

name: outcome/Cough
description: Cough condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Decreased_libido
description: The first condition record of decreased libido

name: outcome/Dementia
description: The first condition record of dementia

name: outcome/Depression
description: The first condition record of depression, which is followed by another depression condition record, at least two drugs used to treat depression without another indication, or two psychotherapy procedures

name: outcome/Diarrhea
description: Diarrhea condition record of any type; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/End_stage_renal_disease
description: End stage renal disease (ESRD) is defined by at least one diagnosis in any setting, followed by at least one additional diagnosis or a dialysis-related procedure within 90 days

name: outcome/Fall
description: Fall condition record of any type; successive records with >180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Gastrointestinal_bleeding
description: Gastrointestinal hemorrhage condition record during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Genitourinary_infection
description: Condition record of any type of genital or urinary tract infection during an outpatient or ER vists

name: outcome/Gout
description: The first condition record of gout

name: outcome/Headache
description: Headache condition record of any type; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hepatic_failure
description: The first condition record of hepatic failure, necrosis, or coma

name: outcome/Hyperkalemia
description: Condition record for hyperkalemia or potassium measurements > 5.6 mmol/L; successive records with >90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hypoglycemia
description: Hypoglycemia condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hypokalemia
description: Hypokalemia condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hypomagnesemia
description: Hypomagnesemia condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hyponatremia
description: Hyponatremia condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Hypotension
description: Hypotension condition record of any type; successive records with > 90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Impotence
description: The first condition record of impotence

name: outcome/Insomnia
description: The first condition record of insomnia

name: outcome/Interstitial_lung_disease
description: The first condition record of Interstitial lung disease

name: outcome/Lung_cancer
description: Primary malignant neoplasm of lung condition record of any type; limited to earliest event per person

name: outcome/Malignant_neoplasm
description: First occurrence of malignant neoplasm, followed by at least one additional diagnosis of the same type (melanoma, bladder, brain, breast, colon and rectum, kidney, leukemia, liver, lung, lymphoma, multiple myeloma, ovary, pancreas, prostate, thyroid, uterus, myelodysplastic syndrome)

name: outcome/Measured_renal_dysfunction
description: First creatinine measurement with value > 3 mg/dL

name: outcome/Nausea
description: Nausea condition record of any type; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Neutropenia_or_agranulocytosis
description: The first condition record of neutropenia or agranulocytosis

name: outcome/3pt_MACE
description: Primary non-melanoma skin cancer record of any type; limited to earliest event per person

name: outcome/Open_angle_glaucoma
description: The first condition record of open-angle glaucoma

name: outcome/Edema
description: Edema condition record of any type; successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Photosensitivity
description: Condition record of drug-induced photosensitivity during any type of visit

name: outcome/Pneumonitis
description: Pneumonitis records of any type; limited to earliest event per person. successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Pulmonary_fibrosis
description: Pulmonary fibrosis records of any type; limited to earliest event per person

name: outcome/Rash
description: Rash condition record of any type; successive records with >90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Rhabdomyolysis
description: Rhabdomyolysis condition record or muscle disorder condition record with creatine measurement 5*ULN during an inpatient or ER visit; successive records with >90 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Seizure
description: Seizure records of any type; limited to earliest event per person

atlasName: Stevens-Johnson syndrome and toxic epidermal necrolysis
name: outcome/Stevens_Johnson_syndrome
description: The first condition record of Stevens-Johnson Syndrome or toxic epidermal necrolysis (TENS)

name: outcome/Suicide
description: The first condition record of suicide or suicidal ideation

name: outcome/Syncope
description: Syncope condition record of any type; successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Thrombocytopenia
description: The first condition record of thrombocytopenia

name: outcome/Tinnitus
description: The first condition record of Tinnitis

name: outcome/Type_2_diabetes_mellitus
description: The first condition record of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, which is followed by another Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus condition record, at least 2 drugs used to treat Type 2 diabetes, or at least 2 HbA1c measurements with value >6.5%

name: outcome/Vasculitis
description: The first condition record of vasculitis, which is followed by another vasculitis condition record or drug to treat vasculiits

name: outcome/Venous_thromboembolic_events
description: Venous thromboembolism condition record of any type; successive records with > 180 day gap are considered independent episodes

name: outcome/Vertigo
description: The first condition record of vertigo

name: outcome/Vomiting
description: Vomiting condition record of any type; successive records with > 30 day gap are considered independent episodes
